body:
I assume you know about most of these, but if you don't id like to tell you. :)

Walls-

- There is nothing to work for. Not fun to play when you have all the kits.

- It auto-joins, which is nice, but its impossible to change teams (as far as I know at least).


Survival Games-

- Strength... This is not a game where everyone has full diamond. It's Sg...


Other-

- It's all 1.8.

title: Glitchs

replies.body: Another thing for walls, I picked my kit, ect..  The game started but it didn't teleport me anywhere, I just fell from where I was flying and died.
replies.body_tagged: Another thing for walls, I picked my kit, ect..  The game started but it didn't teleport me anywhere, I just fell from where I was flying and died.

replies.body:
I like how Walls make you auto join.Because most of the time i see friends without ranks just keep leaving and joining to end up on the same team.

Regarding 1.8 you just have to accept it. Soon enough majority of servers will not use 1.7 and you'll be stuck with 1.8 so get use to it.

I do agree that there needs to be a progression system in place like exp and prestige.

replies.body:
If you want to help the server out please post your glitch findings Here

This will show the Dev that there is a bug that they need to fix.

replies.body: How is the server being in 1.8 a glitch exactly?

replies.body: I agree with you said about the auto join but if I wanted to team with a friend I can't do that, even as emerald.
